system.description: You create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the subject. Only the subject can see the phantasm. The subject must make two saves: first Will (disbelief), then Fortitude (to avoid dying from fear). Failure on the Fortitude save means the subject dies from a heart attack. Success on Fortitude means 3d6 points of damage.

components.materialDescription: A small piece of bone and a small square of black silk.

system.savingThrow: Will disbelief, then Fortitude partial; see text
